amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 118-7 to clarify enforcement of obscene matters not protected by the First Amendment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Good (VA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
